role: Optimize system architecture for scale, reliability, and security as MyARK prepares for multi-region and high-concurrency usage.
goals: Stabilize and harden v1 of the ecosystem for real-world usage.
Close the loop between product, data, and reliability for early scale.
Lay foundations for enterprise and partner readiness.
tasks: Document current architecture, data flows, and risks for this role’s domain.
Introduce basic monitoring and feedback loops for the most critical workflows.
Collaborate with adjacent roles to close obvious gaps before enterprise pilots.
Create a short roadmap for Phase 4 requirements related to this role.
Propose a multi-region and sharding strategy for the highest-volume data sets.
Define a minimal set of shared platform services (identity, audit, notifications).
deliverables: Short domain-specific strategy/roadmap doc for this phase.
Updated documentation for this role’s systems and workflows.
One or more implemented improvements aligned with the phase goals.
success_metrics: Clear before/after improvement in reliability, clarity, or value in this domain.
Stakeholders understand and can use the new workflows or capabilities.
This role’s area is ready for the next phase’s increased scope and complexity.
